item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 25, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Notes on Anthropic's Computer Use Ability (43 points | 40 comments)
2. Smarter Than 'Ctrl+F': Linking Directly to Web Page Content (154 points | 95 comments)
3. Bitwarden SDK relicensed from proprietary to GPLv3 (727 points | 272 comments)

6. Yes, we did discover the Higgs (141 points | 68 comments)
7. Why ghosts wear clothes or white sheets instead of appearing in the nude (20 points | 28 comments)
8. Launch HN: Skyvern (YC S23) – open-source AI agent for browser automations (298 points | 65 comments)
9. OpenFeature – a vendor-agnostic, community-driven API for feature flagging (141 points | 45 comments)
10. Why Safety Profiles Failed (197 points | 144 comments)
11. Never Missing the Train Again (312 points | 115 comments)
12. Security research on Private Cloud Compute (272 points | 93 comments)

20. ST Book, the Notebook Atari ST (79 points | 47 comments)

22. Vapi (YC W21) is hiring a founding infra engineer to handle scale ( | hide)
23. The Lion of St. Mark's Square in Venice Is Chinese (177 points | 67 comments)
24. Lingo: A Go micro language framework for building Domain Specific Languages (110 points | 38 comments)
25. The brain's waste clearing lymphatic system shown in people for first time (182 points | 63 comments)
26. The Script Creator (28 points | 1 comment)
27. A Primer on Vintage Cassette Decks: How to Find a Good One (38 points | 57 comments)

29. Getting Claude Computer Use agent to spin up another agent in its VM (3 points | discuss)
30. Calculating the norm of a complex number (55 points | 35 comments)
